summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

Cecil Hunter, a former student of Miskatonic University, is currently a patient at the Arkham Sanatorium due to a nervous breakdown. He was admitted by Professor Charles Leiter, who claimed to have found him in a troubled state and promised to inform his family, but no family has come forward. Hunter is now in a fragile mental state, having experienced a horrific event while attempting to copy the occult text within the Witch Trial Papers, and is desperate to complete his work and escape the sanatorium. He may attempt to escape and seek out the investigators' company if they show sympathy.
